item.title: Wild Overwatch 2 Skin Concept Turns Juno Into Shadow the Hedgehog
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fans have been posting creative skin concepts for Juno in Overwatch 2, with one Reddit user sharing a Shadow the Hedgehog-inspired design.
  • 2024 has been dubbed the "Year of Shadow" by Sega, with the popular antihero set to appear in several upcoming projects.

A clever Overwatch 2 fan has come up with a unique skin concept for the new hero Juno, this time inspired by Shadow the Hedgehog. Juno, the latest support hero in Overwatch 2 , was unveiled earlier this month and given a live trial weekend for fans to get familiar with the space ranger's kit. Since her reveal, several fans of the game have conjured up some interesting skin ideas for the hero, including one inspired by Fallout 's Nuka-Girl, and another that turns Juno into an actual alien.

Sega has dubbed 2024 the "Year of Shadow" as a way to celebrate the beloved antihero and his appearances in several upcoming Sonic projects. Most notable is Sonic X Shadow Generations , a dual-game collection containing a remaster of 2011's Sonic Generations and the all-new Shadow Generations , which is set to land on October 22. Two months later, Shadow will make his big screen appearance in the third installment of the successful Sonic the Hedgehog film franchise, where he'll be brought to life by the voice of beloved Hollywood star Keanu Reeves.

In anticipation for Juno's debut in Overwatch 2 , Reddit user Onframer posted their idea for a Shadow the Hedgehog-inspired Juno skin. The incredible concept features Shadow's black and red colors, as well as the franchise's classic golden rings and green emeralds on Juno's wrists and gun. The design even includes Shadow's iconic white Air Shoes that allow him to glide, which likely served as the main inspiration for the idea, as Juno's space ranger boots also allow her to glide and hover in the air.

Overwatch 2 Fan Creates Shadow The Hedgehog-Themed Skin Concept For Juno

Considering the many crossovers Overwatch 2 has participated in since its 2022 launch, it may not be outside the realm of possibility for Blizzard to someday collaborate with Sonic the Hedgehog . Overwatch 2 most recently teamed up with Transformers , and has also collaborated with popular anime series like One Punch Man and Cowboy Bebop . Curiously, Overwatch 2 has yet to team up with another video game franchise.

Juno is set to make her debut in Overwatch 2 alongside the launch of Season 12 on August 27, though details about the season's new maps or modes have yet to be unveiled. As for Shadow the Hedgehog fans, there's a lot to look forward to later in the year when Sonic X Shadow Generations and the Sonic the Hedgehog 3 film are released in October and December, respectively.

item.title: The Next Fire Emblem Protagonist Should Learn from One Unlikely Source
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fire Emblem avatars often fall into common tropes, but Shez from Three Hopes breaks the mold with a unique and expressive personality.
  • Previous avatars like Byleth, Corrin, and Alear were too perfect, making them less relatable to players, but Shez offers a new perspective.
  • Three Hopes strikes a balance by making Shez an engaging protagonist without overshadowing other characters, setting a new standard for future Fire Emblem heroes.

Fire Emblem has tried its hand at a number of player characters at this point. While the series used to focus on more standard main protagonists, featuring an avatar for the player to project on has become a staple at this point. These avatars have certainly had their ups and downs, but the next Fire Emblem protagonist could get an edge by taking notes from an unlikely source.

Despite their differences, many Fire Emblem avatar characters have had a few notable tropes in common. Though some of these tropes are useful or even essential for any self-insert, they have also created some negative patterns. Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes deftly answered these concerns, and the next Fire Emblem protagonist should learn some valuable lessons from each of its predecessors.

Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes Features a Model Protagonist for the Next Game

Fire Emblem Three Hopes and Three Houses

Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes may be seen by some as a black sheep of the family. It's the second Fire Emblem Warriors game but has nothing to do with the first. It's posed as a sequel to Fire Emblem: Three Houses but is really more of an alternate timeline. And despite its status as an alternate timeline, it provides essential context to the story and characters of its predecessor.

Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes is worth playing, thanks in no small part to the game's protagonist. Three Hopes stars Shez, who is somewhat of a rival to Three Houses ' Byleth. Despite both being avatars for the player who works as a mercenary and hosts divine beings, Shez and Byleth couldn't be more different. In fact, Shez makes up for many of Byleth's biggest missteps.

The Major Pitfalls Of Fire Emblem Protagonists

Avatars have to juggle several factors at once, which will inevitably lead to issues for some players. For one, as the avatar is meant for a player to project onto them, they often have blank slate personalities. This is the reason avatars can also tend to blend with the silent protagonist trope, and Byleth is certainly guilty of both. If anything, Byleth leans into it so much so that Fire Emblem: Three Houses treats it as a point of comedy. However, Byleth also shares a slight issue with more verbal protagonists, and that has to do with how other characters treat them.

Players are meant to project onto heroes so that they might fulfill a power fantasy of sorts. Because of this, it's all too commonplace for protagonists to simply be beloved by every character that meets them. This is certainly true for Byleth, but it's even more blatant with Corrin and Alear from Fire Emblem Fates and Fire Emblem Engage respectively.

Despite their apparent differences, these issues create the same end result: avatars can wind up as less interesting to players. They have a personality that, though players may project onto, they certainly can't relate to. Likewise, if all of their relationships are positive, it drains a lot of potential depth from their story. The next Fire Emblem protagonist needs to represent players without overshadowing other aspects of the game.

Fire Emblem Warriors Addressed Major Avatar Criticisms

Shez certainly avoids any pitfalls that come with a wooden personality, as they are one of the most expressive avatars to date. They are certainly more boisterous than Byleth, but dodge other flaws of their predecessors. After all, they are a pretty different personality type from Corrin and Alear, which certainly affects their role within the story.

Shez isn't exactly the center of the universe either. It may simply be a side effect of sharing space with the returning cast of Three Houses , but it certainly plays more to their benefit than not. Some protagonists run the risk of detracting from the rest of the supporting cast, and Fire Emblem Awakening was beloved for avoiding this. Although Robin was certainly important, they gave way for Chrom and Lucina to be the main heroes in their own right.

Fire Emblem Awakening did a great job laying the foundation for compelling avatar characters, and Three Hopes proved that a better balance is possible. Shez brought a lot of personality to the table and did it without detracting from other characters or the story at large. As the most relatable protagonist to date, Shez is the ideal model for Fire Emblem 's next hero.

item.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Player Turns Hospital Into Waffle House
item.description:
Highlights

  • An Animal Crossing: New Horizons player showed off their creativity by transforming a hospital on their island into a Waffle House restaurant.
  • The hilarious redesign includes brown tiling, booth seating, and yellow Waffle House lettering for a realistic touch.
  • The Animal Crossing community embraced the comedic creation, sparking debates on the effectiveness of the island's healthcare.

Video games and meme culture have often crossed over in hilarious ways, including one player's rendition of a Waffle House on their Animal Crossing: New Horizons island. Fans of Animal Crossing: New Horizons have often showcased their creative talents with the game's expansive customization options, and this latest design has left the Animal Crossing community in fits of laughter.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons players have been flexing their imaginations in the game since it first launched back in 2020. The quaint title provided an outlet for exploration for many during the COVID-19 pandemic, and fans have continued to enjoy the game in their own ways. With so many Animal Crossing: New Horizons fan creations frequently shared in online spaces, some designs manage to rise above the rest thanks to sheer comedic value.

A humorous Animal Crossing: New Horizons player shared a look at their clever transformation of their island's hospital into a Waffle House restaurant. The customization features in Animal Crossing: New Horizons allow players an array of freedom when designing their character and island, including the ability to take existing building structures and repurpose them with a bit of imaginative decorating. In this case, the OP decided they had no need for a hospital on their peaceful island and instead wanted to include one of their favorite restaurants. Waffle House is among many American fast food staples and has earned a hilarious legacy in meme culture, and its inclusion in Animal Crossing: New Horizons has been met with raucous laughter from fellow players.

Waffle House In Animal Crossing: New Horizons

The Animal Crossing Waffle House features a number of familiar elements that breakfast aficionados may recognize. Brown rectangular tiling, booth and bar stool seating, and the iconic yellow lettering of Waffle House make for an amusingly accurate recreation of the beloved dining locale. Many joked that the Waffle House, though no longer able to provide medical assistance to the Animal Crossing: New Horizons Villagers, may instead offer emotional and spiritual healing in the form of delicious syrupy waffles. Others questioned the effectiveness of the Animal Crossing healthcare system, pondering if the Waffle House was an overall upgrade or simply a lateral replacement.

From a hospital turned Waffle House to a Breaking Bad meth lab in Animal Crossing: New Horizons , the game's community has certainly made the most of its customization elements. As both new and returning fans share fun designs of their islands, Animal Crossing: New Horizons continues to delight players years after its initial release.

item.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake: The Best Treasure Combinations
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Resident Evil 4's Treasure Combo Bonuses Explained
  • The Best Combinations for Treasures in RE4 Remake
  • Best Way to Invest Your Gemstones in Treasures
  • How to Find the Best Combination for Treasures

In Resident Evil 4 , treasure combinations are gemstone patterns inlaid into a valuable item to increase its sales price. The remake has ten variants of these patterns: Duo, Trio, Quartet, Quintet, Two Colors, Three Colors, Two Duos, Four Colors, Duo & Trio, and Five Colors. In the original game, decorating a treasure with different-colored gems was the best combo. However, the new patterns introduced in the remake come with various bonuses that each affect the item’s price uniquely.

Updated on July 29, 2024, by Mohsen Baqery : In the previous updates, we aimed to add more information regarding treasure combos, explaining how you can earn the highest profit using inlay combos. This current update expands on this by adding bulleted lists of each treasure combo’s components and sales price . Additionally, we now have several dedicated sections to describe how gemstone rarities and types may affect your decoration bonuses.

Resident Evil 4's Treasure Combo Bonuses Explained

The bonus system in RE4 works by multiplying the additional value of the gems by a number ranging from ×1.1 to ×2.0. Two blue gemstones, for example, increase a treasure’s value by 8,000. But with the added value of the Dou Combo, their bonus adds up to 10,400.

The following table shows all gemstone combinations and explains their bonuses:

The Best Combinations for Treasures in RE4 Remake

Considering the bonus, the best treasure combinations in the RE4 remake are Five Colors, Quintet, and Duo Trio .

With the Five Color combo, the goal is to decorate a treasure with five gems of different colors. With Quintet, the goal is to combine five same-colored gemstones. And with Duo & Trio, the aim should be to have a same-colored pair and a same-colored triad of gems on one treasure.

With that being said, here are the most expensive treasure combinations in the RE4 remake.

#1. Elegant Crown (Duo & Trio)

  • Items : Elegant Crown, two Yellow Gems, three Red Beryls
  • Sales price : 108,000 Ptas

The most lucrative combination for the Elegant Crown is a Duo & Trio with two yellow gems and three red beryls. The combo would increase the crown’s price to 108,000 Ptas., making it the most expensive item in the game.

Quintet is also a good combination for the Elegant Crown. With five gems of different colors, its value goes up to 100,000.

#2. Ornate Necklace (Quartet)

  • Items : Ornate Necklace, two Red Beryls, two Red Gems
  • Sales Price : 59,500 Ptas

To sell the Ornate Necklace for the highest price, the player should give it a Quartet combination. An all-red gemstone decoration increases this treasure’s cost to 59,500, making it one of the most high-priced treasures ever.

#3. Chalice of Atonement (Trio)

  • Items : Chalice of Atonement and three Red Beryls
  • Sales Price : 47,600 Ptas

Inlaying the Chalice of Atonement with three red beryls boosts its price to 47,600 Ptas. What makes this treasure even more valuable is its viability; the player can purchase it from the Merchant for 3 Spinels.

#4. Elegant Mask (Trio)

  • Items : Elegant Mask, three Yellow Gems
  • Sales Price : 36,400 Ptas

A combination of three same-colored gemstones is the ideal decoration for the Elegant Mask. Attaching all-yellow jewels to this treasure would increase its price to 36,400 Ptas.

#5. Butterfly Lamp (Trio)

  • Items : Butterfly Lamp, three Blue Gems
  • Sales Price : 25,200 Ptas

Although an average treasure, the Butterfly Lamp with three blue gems is worth 25,200 Ptas. Of course, three yellow stones would up its price even further, but the player is advised to keep those for more precious collectibles like the Elegant Crown.

#6. Golden Lynx (Trio)

  • Items : Golden Lynx, two Red Gems, one Red Beryl
  • Sales Price : 40,000 Ptas

Acquiring the Golden Lynx is no easy feat. However, if you manage to obtain one, enhance its value by adorning it with two Red Gems and one Red Beryl . This Trio gem combination is the optimal choice, as the statue features two round and one square-shaped empty slot. Employing the same-color strategy, you can elevate the overall price of this item to 40,000 Pesetas.

Another viable combination for this treasure involves a Three-Color approach, utilizing a yellow diamond, a sapphire, and an emerald . However, the increase in value closely resembles that of the Trio combination. Therefore, the decision ultimately boils down to the gems available in your inventory.

#7. Flagon (Duo)

  • Items : Flagon, two Yellow Gems
  • Sales Price : 21,600 Ptas

The optimal gemstone combination for a Flagon is the Duo . Adorning this item with two same-colored gems yields the highest bonus rate, x1.2. With the Flagon’s base price set at 4,000 Pesetas, the maximum selling price you can achieve is 21,600 Pesetas , assuming you utilize two Yellow Diamonds.

Don’t waste your rare gemstones on Flagon. Since the treasure’s base price is low, it is best to enhance it with common gems like rubies.

#8. Splendid Bangle (Dou)

  • Items : Splendid Bangle, two Red Beryls
  • Sales Price : 21,600 Ptas

Combining two Red Beryl gems with a Splendid Bangle boosts its value by 21,600 Pesetas, elevating its worth to 25,600 from the base price of 4,000. While this increment may seem modest, it’s worth noting that multiple Splendid Bangles are scattered throughout the game. Thus, this process can be viewed as a recurring and regenerative profit resource.

If you’re planning on saving your rare Beryl, opt for a two-color basic combination instead . With this strategy, you will boost the overall value of the Bangle by a factor of 1.2, resulting in a commendable profit margin. This approach proves particularly advantageous early in your adventure when your treasure-hunting opportunities are restricted.

Best Way to Invest Your Gemstones in Treasures

In RE4 Remake ’s campaign, the availability of gemstones is restricted, but certain types have a higher drop rate . Red Gems, for instance, are more abundant and easier to come by. Therefore, if you aim to enhance the value of common loot, embellishing it with Red Gems is advisable. However, it’s wise to retain rare gemstones like Yellow Diamonds , as they are guaranteed to significantly increase the value of end-game treasures.

How to Find the Best Combination for Treasures

To come up with the best combinations, calculate the final price beforehand or try different patterns in the pause menu. The formula for treasure combinations is simple: Sum the gemstones’ price, multiply it by the gemstone bonus rate, and add the sum to the item’s base price.

item.title: Stellar Blade's Cosmetic Updates Should Lead to One PlayStation Crossover
item.description:
Highlights

  • While Stellar Blade's Nano Suits are purely cosmetic, Shift Up plans to release more outfits for Eve in the future.
  • The similarities in themes and aesthetics between Horizon and Stellar Blade make a collaboration for new Nano Suits plausible.
  • A Horizon crossover in Stellar Blade is feasible, considering Sony's history of collaborations with other video games.

Despite the fact that it can only be experienced in single-player, in-game cosmetics are a defining aspect of Shift Up's hit action-adventure title, Stellar Blade . In the game, players can collect a wide variety of Nano Suits, or costumes, for the character they play, a soldier named Eve. While these Nano Suits do come in a range of shapes and sizes, from teddy bear outfits and suits to casual clothes and elaborate dresses, their impact on Stellar Blade 's gameplay is ultimately superfluous, as none of them actually affect Eve's statistics when it comes to defense taken, damage output, and the like. Even still, the game boasts over 74 obtainable outfits, none of which are locked behind a paywall of any sort.

As if those costumes weren't enough, Shift Up has recently confirmed that more Nano Suits for Eve are on the way. While it's currently unclear when exactly these outfits will be added to Stellar Blade , the game's developer anticipates that they'll be included in an update that will release sometime after October 2024. It's anyone's guess what these new Nano Suits will end up looking like, but there are some potential inspirations that Shift Up might pull from. For instance, the Korean developer could take advantage of its publishing deal with Sony Interactive Entertainment to add an outfit based on the armor sets from one of PlayStation's biggest franchises, the Horizon series.

Shift Up Should Add Horizon-Inspired Nano Suits to Stellar Blade

Stellar Blade and Horizon Share Some Similarities, Despite Surface-Level Differences

On the surface, Guerrilla Games' Horizon franchise doesn't seem to have much in common with Stellar Blade , outside of its sci-fi setting. After all, the former follows the adventures of a huntress from a matriarchal tribe in a world overrun by robot dinosaurs, while the latter revolves around a squad of soldiers fighting to save what's left of humanity on a war-torn, futuristic Earth. However, the IPs do share some similarities, namely in terms of aesthetics and themes. Both Horizon and Stellar Blade dabble in topics like malicious AIs, apocalyptic events with ominous origins, and consequences of human hubris, among other things. Furthermore, the futuristic art directions of the two franchises don't outright clash with each other, despite Horizon opting for a more tribal take on the standard sci-fi setting.

Since many elements of the Horizon universe wouldn't feel too out of place in the world of Stellar Blade , some new costumes for Eve inspired by, say, Aloy's armor sets in Horizon: Forbidden West would make for a perfect fit. Some of the outfits Guerrilla Games created for its popular action-adventure franchise are fairly inventive compared to other sci-fi works, what with their traditional, rustic appearances and their technology-infused designs. As such, if Shift Up were to add Nano Suits inspired by the Horizon series to Stellar Blade , Eve would be given some pretty refreshing new skins.

A Horizon and Stellar Blade Collaboration Doesn't Seem Too Unlikely

The Horizon franchise has collaborated with a number of video games in the past, including Genshin Impact , Fortnite , Monster Hunter: World , Destiny 2 , Ghost of Tsushima , and LittleBigPlanet 3 . Based off of Horizon 's extensive history of crossing over with other games, both first- and third-party, it's clear that Sony isn't reluctant to do collaborations involving Guerrilla Games' flagship IP. Because of this, a Stellar Blade and Horizon crossover isn't outside the realm of possibility, especially because both franchises are published by Sony.

That being said, it's hard to say if a Horizon collab will happen this year, if at all. While Shift Up did announce, as part of its Stellar Blade roadmap, that it plans to hold a large IP crossover event for its acclaimed action-adventure game by the end of 2024, it's unclear if this will have anything to do with any of Sony's own franchises, let alone Horizon . Currently, many gamers are speculating that this Stellar Blade collaboration will have something to do with Nier: Automata , though it remains to be seen if that ends up being the case.
